Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel in a terrific location”
Reviews.Author: Dan M
Reviews.Content: partner returned wonderful 4 night stay paris stayed hotel tilsitt etoile location hotel perfect stones throw arc de triomphe able jump metro sights hotel boutique feel double considered absolutely perfect crash parisian hotels famed petite cram people bars restaurants etc breakfast continental buffet sufficient dont expect hot buffet trimmings hotels paris offer fresh pastries hams cheeses etc lack aircon meant hot night lift broke penultimate night 6th floor highly recommend hotel stay city break

Reviews.Title: “Small room with very small bathroom”
Reviews.Author: Ken K
Reviews.Content: booked visited paris friends october 2011 im 6ft tall due size difficulty properly sit toilet friends complained aircon cold offered thanks booked hotel time couldnt agree term location location simply 4 minutes walk arc de triomphe lift terribly slow

Reviews.Title: “Charming boutique hotel near Arc de Triomphe”
Reviews.Author: LosAngelesCAtraveler
Reviews.Content: hotel limited service amenities modern clean light morning self serve breakfast perfect location near arc de triomphe close metro nice restaurants selfserve laundry price reasonable nice ground floor little private patio charming id definitely stay visit

Reviews.Title: “Ok, but not great”
Reviews.Author: RedJez
Reviews.Content: nights september beginning october 2011 arrival advised bounced road sister hotel tivoli checked offered tiny tilsitt kicked bit fuss eventually upgraded superior ok hardly massive clean staff friendly breakfast excellent cant help novotel simular

Reviews.Title: “There are better locations, Nice room, staff not helpful, would not stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Steven B
Reviews.Content: frenchy quiet street short walk arc de triomphe short walk metro champs elysses staff friendly knowledgeable example laundry didnt hotels ridiculous priced laundry service 350 euro wash pair socks desk nearest laundromat sent 5 blocks shut months stumbled laundry 200m round corner airport shuttle service airport advertised 15 euro arrived shock booking fee spoke hotel mistake safe kept locking unable fix slightly annoying stay hard recommend french speaking people street 100m club check google street view doubt hotels price range try st germain parisian experience imho

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable stay in a friendly well appointed hotel”
Reviews.Author: Outtheoffice
Reviews.Content: returned 4 night stay hotel tilsitt booked via cresta holidays using eurostar 5 party including teenagers experience rate trains time hotel easy gare du nord short metro journey left emailed hotel recommend nearby restaurant night booked le hide french dinning experience meant creamy rich reception staff reluctant recommend else restaurants walking distance fine especially italian road paris prices beware hotel clean kids shared family size double little size spotlessly clean somewhat hot quiet air conditioning unit left night hotel quiet night main clientel single business travellers woken passing hotel situated quiet street breakfast wide selection fruit bread crossaints cooked meats slight negative hotel western city travelling east main sites arch de triomphe champs elysee doorstep recommended return paris

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value!”

Reviews.Content: visit paris annually usually stay hotels similar star rating reception staff excellent particularly gentleman sunday 24th october hotel clean comfortable pillows slept paris hotel breakfast generous plenty choice lovely setting lift hotels stayed paris impersonal flashy hotel friendly clean comfortable drawback shortage quality restaurants near vicinity fault hotel gentleman reception booked lovely restaurant sunday evening booking local restaurant materialize restaurant booked meal closed recommendation wonderful evening paris thank

Reviews.Content: paris 3 nights october colleague supposed stay hotel close companys office booked luck booking nice hotel hotel clean personnel friendly helpful breakfast position 2 min arch triumph walk close charles de gaulle étoile metrorer station champs elysees visit paris nice stay choose hotel

Reviews.Content: nice friendly staff speedy check location clean nicely shower breakfast simple view windows business anyway hairdryers attached wall cord short issue recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: biggest advantage hotel location walking distance arc de triomphe convenient modes transport eg metro hop hop buses air france buses airport transfers champ elysses corner hotel breakfast expensive 15 euros person eatery options near arc average size bathroom extent claustrophobic plus mini courtyard rear

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and great location”

Reviews.Content: location price hotel real winner stayed night trip normandy quiet convenient close peripheral road perfectly located morning flight home quad excellent deal families

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly, great location”

Reviews.Content: fantastic hotel size stayed balcony overlooking street perfect nice glass wine 3 stayed 2 nights quiet didnt hear else stayed recommendation mother wasnt wrong return paris deffinately stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal”

Reviews.Content: location 2 minutes arc de triumph walking distance champ street middle 8 euros eifel tower unless walk walked day view seriously consider hotel visit paris won’t disappointed

Reviews.Title: “unparalleled customer service in a great location”

Reviews.Content: spent 2 months traveling throughout europe countless hotels hotel tilsitt etoile customer service staff friendly welcoming eagar time paris suggestions based personal preferences cant staffnot mention location convenient bus ride airport champs elysees near arc de triumph

Reviews.Content: recently stayed tilsitt found quiet clean affordable yuppies eat 100 feet 2 minute walk farmers market type setup front desk nearest paul pastry shop located corner mornings 900am

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel in a fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: m3manohar
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel week late marchearly april enjoyed stay front staff especially manuel helpful hotel fantastic location short blocks arc triomphe streets champs elysee blvd comfortable continental breakfast available daily dining variety dishes including croissants types baguettes variety cheeses yogurts cereal juices boiled eggs complimentary internet available lobby serve variety coffees drinks lobby lobby quiet unwind highly recommend hotel wishing stay clean reasonably priced hotel located fantastic town metro station short blocks

Reviews.Title: “A fantastic hotel, warm and welcoming staff and an ideal location- highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: jadew_7
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel celebrate 21st birthday paris noticed hotel ideal location 5 minute walk champs elyees theres metro station numerous shops restaurants typical french cafes checking simple staff incredibly helpful willing whatever ensure enjoyable stay whilst staff willingly reservations restaurants taxis helped directions recommended 21st parents contacted hotel organise surprise bottle champagne sent hotel easy parents organise trouble trying plans day perfect time bring champagne staff definately extra step connect staying personal level undoubtedly contributed trip memorable follow 2021 girls hoping spacious ready everyday top eachother hotel catered exact single beds floor space centre table chairs wardobe desk bedside lamps tables flat screen tv bathroom powerful shower seperate toilet beautifully decorated noticed straight clean maids cleaned everyday provided clean towels day hotel quiet found ideal tiring day exploring sites paris computer reception internet guests welcome free charge leisure bar didnt looked wide variety drinks available didnt breaksfast stay hotel breakfast located downstairs looked spacious line overall theme hotel overall strongly recommend hotel types guests staff whatever cater incredibly warm welcoming fantastic time memorable stay jade oxford
